text:
e="preserve">John Albert Whittaker (28 March 1950 – 29 September 2020) was a New Zealand rugby league footballer. He played in the 1970s and 1980s at international level for the New Zealand national rugby league team and the Cook Islands.
Whittaker died on 29 September 2020 from cancer at the age of 70.

annotations.surface_form: New Zealand national rugby league team
